mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(app_key) FROM public.ssp_service_app_info ssai JOIN ssp_service_info ssi ON ssai.service_id = ssi.id WHERE ssai.app_name = #{app_name} OR ssai.package_name = #{package_name} OR ssi.name = #{name}
SELECT id , product_name , os , package_id , api_key FROM public.ssp_product WHERE id = #{product_id}
